description:
She`s a sophomore like Raishin. She`s a blonde-haired blue-eyed beauty at first glance, but she`s a talented young girl who`s placed her name amongst Walpurgis Night`s top rankers, the Magi of round. Her nickname is Charl. She manipulates a dragon-form automaton, Sigmund. She was the daughter of an Earl, but she`s been disowned for certain reasons. Her breasts are unfortunately faked with padding.
Source: ANN
name: Charlotte Belew
